name: Blobbers
description:
Blobbers is a fast paced game inspired by quake 3 arena. With high focus on speed mobility providing great dynamic gameplay with combination of cartoony and very vibrant colours.
This project is currently in its early development stages, so feel free to check us out. We aim to make updates every 2-3 weeks till about Christmas period when we plan to wrap this project up!
This is very open project so ideas and concepts are chosen from our community at discord.gg/ravende

Testing

How to test this project?

Join our discord at: discord.gg/ravende

contact any admin for access to test section and just follow our updates there!
